Contributions.title: Enkk - AI without Hype
Contributions.subtitle: Main Youtube Channel
Contributions.description: My YouTube channel offers clear, practical explanations of AI and LLMs, making complex concepts accessible to everyday people through straightforward, hype-free content.

Contributions.title: How do you Evaluate a Large Language Model
Contributions.subtitle: Blog post on Techdale.it
Contributions.description: This blog post introduces the notions of benchmarks and explains the challenges in evaluating Large Language Models.

Contributions.title: Artificial Intelligence Has Been Everywhere for Years
Contributions.subtitle: Blog post on Techdale.it
Contributions.description: This blog post explores the distinction between Artificial Intelligence and Large Language Models, addressing some of the concerns surrounding the growing hype around LLMs.

Contributions.title: How Does it Work?
Contributions.subtitle: An insight on Neural Networks
Contributions.description: This series focuses on Neural Networks, providing an insight on the development of various NN models, from the perceptron to the transformers.

Contributions.title: Programming Python
Contributions.subtitle: Developing a Bot for Twitch chat
Contributions.description: This Italian Python course (~ 13 hours) provides a rapid introduction to the Python programming language, aimed at the development of a Bot able to read, write and reply to users in a Twitch chat.

Contributions.title: LaTeX introduction
Contributions.subtitle: How to write documents like a pro-player
Contributions.description: In this video I provide an introduction to LaTeX: how to write properly formatted documents.

Contributions.title: LaTeX introduction @ Dipartimento di Informatica
Contributions.subtitle: How to write documents like a pro-player
Contributions.description: In this live lecture I provide an introduction to LaTeX: how to write properly formatted documents.

Contributions.title: Dealing with University
Contributions.subtitle: Some tips for freshmans
Contributions.description: University can be challenging. In this video I talk about my experience at Uni, providing some tips on how to manage the stress and the workload.
